title: 14 day ban, IP boost.
body: Bought an ip boost yesterday, and recieved a 14 day ban today.. will my ip boost still be going for that duration of ban or when i'm back?

replies.body:
This might be something we could help you out with.  The best step you can take at this moment is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to us.  One of our agents should be ale to take a deeper dive on your account.  

Can't make any promises about the boost, but I can promise that they'll look into it with you!  Hope this helps! :)

Hey, I had an idea for a new mechanic that can be very helpful to a lot of people dealing with punishments. Its a new option that allows the player themselves to turn off their chat in game. Either by client or ingame. Here is the link to my original post https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/QMc43yUE-riot-new-in-game-chat-option
